body:
These posts will be long. Name your first time in Minecraft and whta you did. 1) Looked up on the wiki how to craft a wooden pickaxe and everything else. 2) Fascinated that there was a cow. 3)  Hid myself in a hole at night. 4) Saw an EnderMen and thought its eyes were on his back.
List yours down below cant wait to read them all.

title: First Time in Minecraft

replies.body: I was playing survival and I didn't know how to do anything. I was just wondering around until night arrives. I looked at a creeper and thought it was friendly :P. I was also playing with my brother Skye (skyecool19) and I saw an enderman. I punched it and got rekt. I told him to watch out for the black guy (Not to be racist)
replies.body_tagged: I was playing survival and I didn't know how to do anything. I was just wondering around until night arrives. I looked at a creeper and thought it was friendly :P. I was also playing with my brother Skye (skyecool19) and I saw an enderman. I punched it and got rekt. I told him to watch out for the black guy (Not to be racist)

replies.body:
1) Built a little dirt hut 100 blocks away from my spawn
2) Got killed by a zombie
3) Sobbed because I didn't know where my house was
4) Remade a house at my spawn, after my friend told me that that was the best thing to do.
5) Continuously got killed by mobs
6) Learned that Peaceful mode exists
7) Learned that MC Wiki existed
8) Learned that Classic Minecraft existed (this, being about 4-5 months later)

Between 7 and 8, I made a giant mine, with a large staircase going down to bedrock (it was about 17 blocks wide), built a little tower with all of the blocks in Minecraft (although bear in mind that this was in Beta 1.7), and a giant mobfarm & foodfarm.

replies.body: Started off in Classic so I really just went server to server till I found Caznowl and their zombie infection mode and lava survival was so epic and fun. Blocktopia too!
replies.body_tagged: Started off in Classic so I really just went server to server till I found Caznowl and their zombie infection mode and lava survival was so epic and fun. Blocktopia too!

replies.body:
1) Hear about minecraft from my friend Scot, It's beta 1.4 right now
2) Ask to play it on his PC, 10 fps.
3)Change the controls from WASD to THE ARROW KEYS.
4) Scot teaches me the crafting recipes (Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Chest, Sword, Door Bucket etc.)
5) Didnt know what Armor was so I got rekt alot.
6) Thatoldcobblestonetexture.jpg
7) Found enough gold for a block of gold
8) Put it in my sexy-ass cave house.
9) Made a bunk bed, slept in it, clipped in the wall and died
10) went strip mining for about 20 minutes
11) Found 8 diamonds, flipped shit because I thought the rarity was much higher
12) Made a pick, sword and another pick.
13) had to go home
14) Couldnt play again til I stole my friends account in beta 1.6
15) Finally got my REAL account in 1.0
16) mfw ive been playing this damn game for like3-4 years

replies.body: Didn't know how to craft anything so I remember I saw a mountain, took all it's dirt and made a wall with the dirt till night came and zombies killed me.. :(
replies.body_tagged: Didn't know how to craft anything so I remember I saw a mountain, took all it's dirt and made a wall with the dirt till night came and zombies killed me.. :(

replies.body:
1) Went on my friends computer and made a 3x3x3 dirt house.
2) Wanted to make a wooden door so badly.
3) Made the wooden door and then went and put it on the front of my dirt house.
4) Watch my friend make a solid gold block house and laugh.......Didn't tell him about my dirt house. :P
5) Change my skin from Steve.
6) Made a wood house.
7) Tame and become puppy lord.
8) Discover gamemode 1.
9) Fell in love.................. With gamemode 1.
10) Made a gamemode with my friend called Skywars.
11) Skywars was added to McZone.
12) Become a Mod on McZone.
13) Make Skywars 2.0.
14) Make banta talk about Skywars 3.0.
15) Story of my life am here now.

replies.body:
>My birthday party with 15 peepz dere
>Get MC from friend, hes a vet.
>Fast forward 4 hours later, everyone but the guy who gave me minecraft left, and we started
>Hardcore mode
>Playing with slushies and chocolate food THEN I DIE
>New world in peaceful survival so I can learn things like the controls but it helps that I watched a lets play
>Become a pro at singleplayer then he shows me MCZone

 and thats how I spent my first 1 hour in Minecraft

replies.body:
1) Way back when zombies dropped feathers, I made a sand base.
2) I saw a creeper
3) I logged off hyperventilating
replies.body_tagged:
1) Way back when zombies dropped feathers, I made a sand base.
2) I saw a creeper
3) I logged off hyperventilating

replies.body:
1) Was on Creative mode because I didn't know that there was a survival mode
2) Tried to build a house in the water on a tiny island (idek) and I thought it looked really cool even though it probably looked terrible
3) Since it was an island and I was a nub I kept on falling into the water which would then take me ages to get out of
4) Once it was night I saw a island inhabited with zombies and I almost had a heart attack
5) Alot of times I would enter the house and see holes in the house and hear explosions but I had no idea what creepers were or that light prevents mobs from spawning, so it kept happening!
6) And finally, when I was done playing MC in a day's work, the next day I would try to rejoin the world but then Oh look! The map wasn't there, because I didn't know that you were supposed to save! (Then this happened again, and again, and again.)
replies.body_tagged:
1) Was on Creative mode because I didn't know that there was a survival mode

5) Alot of times I would enter the house and see holes in the house and hear explosions but I had no idea what creepers were or that light prevents mobs from spawning, so it kept happening!
6) And finally, when I was done playing MC in a day's work, the next day I would try to rejoin the world but then Oh look! The map wasn't there, because I didn't know that you were supposed to save! (Then this happened again, and again, and again.)

replies.body:
1) Lit myself on fire
2) Played on peaceful
3) Build a dirt house
4) Made a redstone trap (no lie)
5) Didn't know that wooden pickaxes broke cobblestone.  So I had creepers follow me and let them blow up stone until I had enough for a stone pickaxe and a furnace.

replies.body:
1.) Before I got Minecraft, I played on my cousin's laptop. I just built roller coasters because I didn't know how to do anything else

2.) Proceeded to watch Minecraft YouTubers

3.) Finally Got Minecraft... Pocket Edition

4.) Then got Minecraft for PC

5.) Built a cobblestone home

6.) ???

7.) Now I'm here

The End

replies.body:
1. Brother let me play on his account
2. Made a survival world on peaceful cos I was scared of mobs.
3. Constantly used the wiki to look up recipes for stuff.
4. Found a village.
5. Started a Villager fam.
6. Expanded the houses so that we could all live happily.
7. Built a hotel for the villagers.
8. Built a sign out of dirt saying "Hotel"
9. Got my own account
10. DIscovered servers
11. Was an bad.
The End.

replies.body:
I didn't like survival when I first started.
I hated th idea of grinding for everything that you needed.

So I player in creative when I first player Minecraft.
I have no creativity whatsoever and made the ugliest brick house ever xD

Ah the memories.

replies.body:
1. Started in Minecraft PE
2. I thought I was good and then I convinced my dad to get me Minecraft for my birthday (I think he regrets this part a lot xD)
3. Spent about an hour trying to figure out how to place and destroy a block... And move forward (I hit random keys until I found out, I felt so happy :') Danngg I placed a dirt block!)
4. Messed around with my controls and eventually got used to it.. That's why I have opposite controls today :P
5. Watched a crap ton of Minecraft videos
6. Went on those Minecraft server lister websites and added a lot of random servers...
7. Found Skywars which lead me here :)

replies.body:
»Youtube vids
»Got MC
»Magiclauncher
(Yes i had mods b4 my first world TMI and Millenaire)
»Spawn in forest
»Get wood stuff
»Killed Millenaire guy
»Use his chest
»He respawned
»Couldent get my stuff
»Spawned fire block
»Burned to death
»Respawned on fire
»Go in water
»Drown..
»Ragequit
To this day ive nevergone on that world again
still have it :P but i dont wanna try to load a 1.3 world in
1.7

replies.body:
1. heard minecraft from a friend
2. played computer version
3. Went on single player and blow stuff up
4. found an hg fac server
5. made a good faction
6. staff ab00se
7. killed server with a fac called resistance and raided it with withers
8. searched google for "good servers"
9 went on pvp.oc.tc
10 found nostalgia
11. found the OCN forums
12. Project Ares --> Overcast Network
13. Heard about Avicus in forums
14. Asked turtles what avicus is
15. Joined and registered in avicus
16 forgot password to avicus account
17. ask staff member to reset account
18 did succesfully
19 introduced to forums
20 GOt into avicus
21. Now watching anime and playing other games :)

replies.body:
1) Get Minecraft In late alpha
2) Build a house and quit the game for a year because I think it's BORING AS ****
3) Come back because you know YOLO and I play some survival
4) I finally learn how to join a server because I was to derpy to do it before
5) I love the game and start playing factions a year later
6) Become good at factions and move to mini games and am once again a noob who plays mineplex 24/7
7) Find OCN and played on that for a bit
8) Am playing on Hypixel one day and get banned for cursing out a player after he calls me eZ
9) Look for somewhere else to play walls and Find this!
